sentences.en: In the recent mayoral election in Kiev, candidate of Tymoshenko League lost to the incumbent, despite her insistence that "he is me without the plait".
sentences.cn: 在最近的基辅市市长选举中，季莫申科联盟的候选人输给了现任市长，尽管她一直强调“他就是没有辫子的我”。

sentences.en: The mayoral election is held annually.
sentences.cn: 选举已经定在十月举行。
